Himachal Pradesh at High Risk of Natural Disasters

A recent IIT Ropar study reveals that over 45% of Himachal Pradesh is vulnerable to landslides, floods, and avalanches. The most affected areas are steep mountain slopes, especially those above 3,000 meters.
